blurr.tooltip: Average of the surrounding area with a uniform distribution

median.tooltip: Median of the sourrounding area, very slow calculation

gaus.tooltip: Avergage of the sourrunding area with a gaussian kernal

copy.tooltip: Copy the values without any change

mix.tooltip: Mix of the 2 inputs for every pixel

threshhold.tooltip: 0 or 1 if the threshhold is reached, calculated per channel

rgbThreshhold.tooltip: 0 or 1 if the threshhold for the channel is reached

sobelX.tooltip: Gradiant in x-direction of the local 3x3 area

sobelY.tooltip: Gradiant in y-direction of the local 3x3 area

robertsA.tooltip: Gradiant in the bot-left-direction of the local 2x2 area

robertsB.tooltip: Gradiant in the bot-right-direction of the local 2x2 area

laplaceA.tooltip: Difference to the vertical and horizontally pixels

laplaceB.tooltip: Difference to the vertical, horizontally and diagonally pixels

edgeValue.tooltip: Absolute Value of a edge value with sign

max.tooltip: Maximum per channel of the inputs

euclidean.tooltip: Euclidean distance per channel of the inputs
